title.rendered: RHINO BAR SUIT FORD RANGER RAPTOR

content.rendered:
THE EVOLUTION 3D FRONT REPLACEMENT WINCH BAR FOR THE FORD RANGER RAPTOR IS HERE!

This is the start of our new Evolution 3D range of bars and its even better than our last! These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, whilst retaining the factory rated recovery points, and heavy duty bash plate.

-The 3D Evolution Ranger Raptor Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing grey finish to match the factory flares or can be colour coded as an option. All our parts are now zinc plated before powder coating to ensure a long rust free life. They are a 3mm and 6mm steel construction. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Raptor grey or can be optioned as colour coded with the rest of the bar. We also offer as standard, 40W (each) LED Spot Beam driving lights with incorporated DRL (Replaces factory fog lights). Our bars are individually designed for each vehicle so as you can see look amazing without sticking way out and looking boxy.

-The Evolution bumpers have carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. Crash testing is vital to ensure your air bags fire when they should. When comparing bars ensure dynamic crash testing is carried out for your safety. During install the Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Includes:

The below are included items that are charged as extra on other brands

Winch mount (no additional brackets required)

Integrated 40W (each) driving lights

Hinged number plate bracket to access winch area / Fairlead

Front high lift jacking points
Optional

Can be colour coded to match your vehicle

WinchLED light bar to fit in mid-section

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT FORD RANGER RAPTOR

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
